items.content_html: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.
items.title: observerly/astrometry: observerly's lightweight, zero-dependency, type safe astrometry library written in TypeScript. This library can be used to ascertain to positions of the Sun, Moon and the planets, as well as ascertain transit times for any astronomical object.

items.content_html: "This weather-app is a lightweight JavaScript app that provides real-time weather updates for upto hundreds of cities with a user-friendly interface, It fetches data from reliable weather APIs, offering current temperature, conditions, and forecasts at a glance. Ideal for quick and accurate weather insights!"
items.title: hassanshakil576/Weather-App: "This weather-app is a lightweight JavaScript app that provides real-time weather updates for upto hundreds of cities with a user-friendly interface, It fetches data from reliable weather APIs, offering current temperature, conditions, and forecasts at a glance. Ideal for quick and accurate weather insights!"
